name: FroniusSolarweb
0:
”Alexa, launch solar web”
”Alexa, ask solar web for the height of my self sufficiency value today”
”Alexa, ask solar web what the current state of charge of my battery is”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: solar web
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Fronius Solar.web skill for Amazon Alexa can provide you with detailed information on your PV system registered in Fronius Solar.web.
ATTENTION: The skill can only be used in combination with a fee-based Fronius Solar.web Premium account.


Requirements - To use this skill you need
/ A fee-based Fronius Solar.web Premium account 
/ A PV system with at least one Fronius inverter that is registered in Fronius Solar.web and regularly sends PV data
/ For some questions: a Fronius storage solution, a Fronius Smart Meter and/or a Fronius Ohmpilot with a
temperature sensor
You can link your Fronius Solar.web Premium account with the Solar.web skill by using your login-credentials.

SUPPORTED QUESTIONS
/ Energy produced
Time ranges: currently / yesterday / today / today from x to y o’clock / last week / this week / last month / this month / last year / this year
Example: „Alexa, ask solar web, how much energy my system produced this month“

/ Surplus
Time ranges: currently / yesterday / today / last week / this week / last month / this month / last year / this year
Example: „Alexa, ask solar web, how big my surplus yesterday was“

/ Self-sufficiency
Time ranges: currently / yesterday / today / last week / this week / last month / this month / last year / this year
Example: „Alexa, ask solar web, how high my self-sufficieny today is“

/ State of charge of battery
„Alexa, ask solar web, what the state of charge of my battery currently is“

/ Current temperature of water heater (applicable with Fronius Ohmpilot)
„Alexa, ask solar web, how high the temperature of my boiler is“

/ Errors
„Alexa, ask solar web, if my system currently has an error“

/ Daily summary
„Alexa, ask solar web, how my day was“

/ Change selection of PV system
„Alexa, tell solar web I would like to change my PV system.“


You can find a more detailed list of all questions and an installation guide here: https://www.fronius.com/~/downloads/Solar%20Energy/Quick%20Guides/SE_QG_Alexa_Skill_Fronius_Solarweb_Installation_EN.PDF
